pageContent: Background: The most appropriate management of incidental prostate cancers diagnosed at transurethral resection of prostate has been debated. It is important to determine the long-term outcomes to establish an appropriate management in patients with incidental prostate cancer.

metaData.source:
Clinical applications of expression profiling and proteomics in prostate cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/17593619/
